commands.name: view
commands.title: View
commands.subtitle: Search or Leaderboards
commands.description: View AI models from Supabase: search and leaderboards

preferences.name: SUPABASE_ANON_KEY
preferences.title: Supabase Anon Key
preferences.description: Anon JWT with read-only access via RLS

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
